name: Santa Claus vs Area 51
description:
CONTROLS: WASD + MOUSE

This version is not final, and is missing the final level, as well as a lot of polish.

Four months after Christmas, Santa is watching the annual penguin battle royale, enjoying a beer on his sofa, when he discovers a missing Christmas list crumpled up between the cushions on his sofa! He's late delivering a present! But the address is inside Area 51... How on earth will he get in?

Delivery to Area 51 tells the tale of Santa's mission to break into the famously secret military base Area 51, to deliver a present. Solve devious puzzles to avoid being caught!

Christmas is coming, bitches!

Source code: https://github.com/tcoxon/delivery-to-area51
